episodes.title: Verdict in Sonya Massey Trial, the ‘God’s Misfit’ Murders, and Michael Myers Copycats
episodes.description: Breaking down the verdict in the Sonya Massey case and the urgent search for missing 9-year-old Melodee Buzzard. Journalist Paige Stockton joins us to unpack the Kansas “God’s Misfits” murders, while casting director and pop culture expert Doron Ofir dives into the real-life crimes inspired by Halloween and the eerie Poltergeist curse. Plus, producer Ava shares the haunting, unsolved mystery of Henry McCabe. Tune in for all the details. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Doomsday Murder Couple Sends Messages from Prison; Alleged Kirk Killer to Face Federal Charges
episodes.description: The latest on the case of Charlie Kirk’s murder; the strange messages from convicted ‘Doomsday parents’ Chad and Lori Daybell; and an unpacking of the Brian Walshe case ahead of his murder trial. Plus, the New Zealand dad who hid his kids from authorities for years, and the woman murdered by her state trooper ex after asking police for help. Also, hear from a hero. Tune in for all the details. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
